properties.name: internalproperties.admin.employeeKey
properties.description: Defines the key that an employee have to enter during sign up to protect admin system from illegal outside access.

properties.name: internalproperties.discount.levelone
properties.description: Customer discount of level one that customer will gain after sign up.

properties.name: internalproperties.discount.leveltwo
properties.description: Customer discount of level two that customer will gain when total sum of his orders will exceed user total of level two.

properties.name: internalproperties.discount.levelthree
properties.description: Customer discount of level three that customer will gain when total sum of his orders will exceed user total of level three.

properties.name: internalproperties.discount.employee
properties.description: Specifies discount in the shop for accounts that have Employee authority.

properties.name: internalproperties.discount.totalforlevelone
properties.description: Specifies amount of money that customer have to spend overall in the shop to achieve discount of level 1.

properties.name: internalproperties.discount.totalforleveltwo
properties.description: Specifies amount of money that customer have to spend overall in the shop to achieve discount of level 2.

properties.name: internalproperties.discount.totalforlevelthree
properties.description: Specifies amount of money that user have to spend overall in the shop to achieve discount of level 3.
